long_description: The heavy-duty Katadyn Emergency Series Pocket Microfilter is ideal for frequent use, either in an emergency or under the extreme conditions you may encounter in the mountains. Aluminum pump construction and durable ceramic filter provide reliable performance. Removes particles, bacteria, cysts and parasites larger than 0.2 microns, including protozoa such as giardia and cryptosporidia. Includes a carbon bottle adaptor, which reduces chemicals and helps improves the taste of the water. Katadyn Emergency Series Pocket Microfilter also comes with a prefilter, bottle clip and carry bag.
short_description: The heavy-duty Katadyn Emergency Series Pocket Microfilter is ideal for frequent use, either in an emergency or under the extreme conditions you may encounter in the mountains.
